description: List expected time of arrivals with filtering

flags.description: Filter by tender job schedule shift ID
flags.name: --tender-job-schedule-shift

flags.description: Filter by job schedule shift ID
flags.name: --job-schedule-shift

flags.description: Filter by minimum expected arrival time (ISO 8601)
flags.name: --expected-at-min

flags.description: Filter by maximum expected arrival time (ISO 8601)
flags.name: --expected-at-max

flags.description: Filter by has expected arrival time (true/false)
flags.name: --is-expected-at

side_effects: Reads expected time of arrival updates.
validation_notes: Filters accept ISO 8601 timestamps for expected-at min/max; boolean filters expect true/false.
